description: clear glass panel with large circle made up of two opaque white and tan varigated shapes at top and two opaque green and tan varigated shapes at bottom; orange, white, blue, green, turquoise, lavender and yellow small squares; received mounted in frame with 98.256.5.8-11 and 98.256.6.3-7
portfolio: From Capitol Building and Loan Association Building, Topkea, Kansas (demolished 1967); George Grant Elmslie architect
title: Window, from a set of 12
